post.body: picked up fieldrunners - very cool!
@Lisawalsh @michaelstewart @briankhang thanks for the suggestions!
if it's anything like us your sleep will actually be worse. Not trying to scare you though, just sayin'. :)
Congrats, girl! Can't wait to see the pics!
very cool! Congrats! :)
What?! Really? Congrats! (details, please!)
Yes, it appears that Twitter just might be the end of both of us. :)
so you're saying that my folly is your entertainment?
if sleep deprivation is to be blamed, I may as well just stop twittering altogether. No need to pollute public airways. :)
then I encourage you to watch VI. Might make a great date night with Helen. :) haha...
you think Rocky V was bad? Try watching Rocky Balboa (Rocky VI). We watched it at my dad's on Christmas day. That was painful...
you mean the bookmarklet? Check this out! :) http://tinyurl.com/7jcae2
wow! Glad to hear that he's okay!
Need to find twitter peeps that are in time zones at least 8 hrs ahead of me so that, on nights like these, I'm not talking to myself. Yes?
Middle of the night break from sleep. Cuz you know, too much sleep can kill you.
Looking for some cool iPhone games to load up on. Anyone got any recommendations?
Tearin' it up with family and friends Persian style. Hoping to get a piece of cake before it's all gone!
Just got back from an awesome dinner with a close friend who just got home after living in Costa Rica for a year. So fun!
Did I really admit that we watched Rocky Balboa on Christmas day? *hides in shame*
Just learned how to post Safari links, from mobile Safari, into Twitterfon via the new bookmarklet feature. Very nice!
